    background-color: #E8F4FB;
  }

</style>

        <ol class="ScrollBumpDialog-usersList clearfix js-users-list"></ol>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>

      <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="More">

        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      

        <div class="ReplyingToContextBelowAuthor" data-aria-label-part="">
    Replying to <a class="pretty-link js-user-profile-link" href="/alexmassie" data-user-id="13753642" rel="noopener" dir="ltr"><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>alexmassie</b></span></a>



</div>


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">The Tories, meanwhile, won 323,852 more votes in Scotland in 2017 than they won in 2015. That's, er, quite something.</p>
</div>

        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Scotlands new Conservative MPs will aim to deliver, not divide:

      <li class="js-stream-item stream-item stream-item&#10;" data-item-id="828291740020916224" id="stream-item-tweet-828291740020916224" data-item-type="tweet" data-suggestion-json="{&quot;suggestion_details&quot;:{},&quot;tweet_ids&quot;:&quot;828291740020916224&quot;,&quot;scribe_component&quot;:&quot;tweet&quot;}">

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">.<a href="/RuthDavidsonMSP" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="211994193"><s>@</s><b>RuthDavidsonMSP</b></a> "It is vital that the SNP Government begins to recognise that we achieve more by pulling together, not pulling apart."</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">After a year of foul-ups - farmers now being asked to hand back 750,000 because the SG can't convert  to .<a href="https://t.co/VJFGBD2i5o" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://www.thecourier.co.uk/fp/news/politics/scottish-politics/324704/scottish-governments-750k-blunder-caused-failure-correctly-convert-euros-sterling/" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://www.thecourier.co.uk/fp/news/politics/scottish-politics/324704/scottish-governments-750k-blunder-caused-failure-correctly-convert-euros-sterling/"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://www.</span><span class="js-display-url">thecourier.co.uk/fp/news/politi</span><span class="invisible">cs/scottish-politics/324704/scottish-governments-750k-blunder-caused-failure-correctly-convert-euros-sterling/</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/ScotTories" data-user-id="171876607">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/935466812048801792/PVKllFM2_bigger.jpg" alt="" />

        <span class="Icon Icon--caretDownLight Icon--small"></span>
        <span class="u-hiddenVisually">More</span>
      </div>
  </button>
  <div class="dropdown-menu is-autoCentered">
  <div class="dropdown-caret">
    <div class="caret-outer"></div>
    <div class="caret-inner"></div>
  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Inverurie (Aberdeenshire) result:
CON: 38.8% (+21.4)
SNP: 34.6% (-2.5)
LDEM: 22.5% (+5.1)
LAB: 4.1% (-9.1)
GRN &amp; two INDs stood previously.</p>
</div>

    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Peter Chapman</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>PeterChapmanMSP</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

    </div>
    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">
      <div class="child-confirmation-item">
        <span class="child-confirmation-text"></span>
        <span class="undo-child-feedback-action">Undo</span>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4">Fantastic result for <a href="/Colin_J_Clark" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3129059302"><s>@</s><b>Colin_J_Clark</b></a> on his election. Only the <a href="/ScotTories" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="171876607"><s>@</s><b>ScotTories</b></a> can beat the <a href="/hashtag/snp?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>snp</b></a> these days. The shine is truly coming off<a href="https://t.co/1MVBi4QgEn" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/aberdeenshire/status/794500212870025216" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/aberdeenshire/status/794500212870025216"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/aberdeenshire/</span><span class="invisible">status/794500212870025216</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Jamie Greene MSP added,</p>
  
      <div class="QuoteTweet&#10;    &#10;    &#10;    u-block js-tweet-details-fixer">
  <div class="QuoteTweet-container">
    <a class="QuoteTweet-link js-nav" href="/Aberdeenshire/status/794500212870025216" data-conversation-id="794500212870025216" aria-hidden="true">
    </a>
    <div class="QuoteTweet-innerContainer u-cf js-permalink js-media-container" data-item-id="794500212870025216" data-item-type="tweet" data-screen-name="Aberdeenshire" data-user-id="20442387" href="/Aberdeenshire/status/794500212870025216" data-conversation-id="794500212870025216" tabindex="0">

        <div class="QuoteTweet-authorAndText u-alignTop">
            
  <div class="QuoteTweet-originalAuthor u-cf u-textTruncate stream-item-header account-group js-user-profile-link">
    <b class="QuoteTweet-fullname u-linkComplex-target">AberdeenshireCouncil</b><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr">@<b>Aberdeenshire</b></span>
  </div>

          
          
          <div class="QuoteTweet-text tweet-text u-dir" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="2" dir="ltr">Colin Clark (Scottish Conservative and Unionist) is the new councillor for Inverurie and District Ward with a total of 1,302 votes.</div>
        </div>
      </div>
    </div>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">.<a href="/ScotTories" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="171876607"><s>@</s><b>ScotTories</b></a> have just won both by-elections in Aberdeenshire.   <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Fantastic win for our new <a href="/ScotTories" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="171876607"><s>@</s><b>ScotTories</b></a> Cllr for <a href="/hashtag/Inverurie?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Inverurie</b></a> <a href="/Colin_J_Clark" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3129059302"><s>@</s><b>Colin_J_Clark</b></a> who will stand up for local people against SNP centralisation</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Colin Clark (Scottish Conservative and Unionist) is the new councillor for Inverurie and District Ward with a total of 1,302 votes.</p>

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Good luck to our great <a href="/ScotTories" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="171876607"><s>@</s><b>ScotTories</b></a> candidates <a href="/Colin_J_Clark" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3129059302"><s>@</s><b>Colin_J_Clark</b></a> &amp; Ian Taylor in today's <a href="/hashtag/Inverurie?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Inverurie</b></a> &amp; <a href="/hashtag/Banff?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Banff</b></a> by-elections <a href="/hashtag/TeamRuth?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>TeamRuth</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/VoteTory?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>VoteTory</b></a></p>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">

      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>

<div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="4"><a href="/Colin_J_Clark" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="3129059302"><s>@</s><b>Colin_J_Clark</b></a> will make an excellent and dedicated local councillor for Inverurie. A local guy who knows the issues affecting the community<a href="https://t.co/BadyO40dwg" rel="nofollow noopener" dir="ltr" data-expanded-url="https://twitter.com/pressjournal/status/778870963064692736" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" target="_blank" title="https://twitter.com/pressjournal/status/778870963064692736"><span class="tco-ellipsis"></span><span class="invisible">https://</span><span class="js-display-url">twitter.com/pressjournal/s</span><span class="invisible">tatus/778870963064692736</span><span class="tco-ellipsis"><span class="invisible"></span></span></a></p>
</div>


<p class="u-hiddenVisually" aria-hidden="true" data-aria-label-part="3">Ross Thomson MP added,</p>

          <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--more js-more-ProfileTweet-actions">
    <div class="dropdown">

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/Colin_J_Clark" data-user-id="3129059302">

    <span class="FullNameGroup">
      <strong class="fullname show-popup-with-id u-textTruncate " data-aria-label-part="">Colin J. Clark MP</strong><span></span><span class="UserBadges"><span class="Icon Icon--verified"><span class="u-hiddenVisually">Verified account</span></span></span><span class="UserNameBreak"></span></span><span class="username u-dir u-textTruncate" dir="ltr" data-aria-label-part="">@<b>Colin_J_Clark</b></span></a>

        
        <small class="time">

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo ProfileTweet-action--unfavorite u-linkClean js-actionButton js-actionFavorite" type="button">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Undo like">
      <span role="presentation" class="Icon Icon--heart Icon--medium"></span>
      <div class="HeartAnimation"></div>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Liked</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">

      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
        <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedVideo" data-nav="embed_video">
          <button type="button" class="dropdown-link"> Embed Video</button>
        </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Speaking out against <a href="/RichardLochhead" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="243628984"><s>@</s><b>RichardLochhead</b></a> and the failure of the SNP to deliver CAP payments.     <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">7</span>
  </span>

  </button>

        <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true"></span>
      </span>
  </button>
</div>

    <div class="ProfileTweet-action ProfileTweet-action--retweet js-toggleState js-toggleRt">
  <button class="ProfileTweet-actionButton  js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button" aria-describedby="profile-tweet-action-retweet-count-aria-688747524543373314">
    <div class="IconContainer js-tooltip" title="Retweet">
      <span class="Icon Icon--medium Icon--retweet"></span>
      <span class="u-hiddenVisually">Retweet</span>
    </div>
      <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCount">
    <span class="ProfileTweet-actionCountForPresentation" aria-hidden="true">7</span>
  </span>

  </button><button class="ProfileTweet-actionButtonUndo js-actionButton js-actionRetweet" data-modal="ProfileTweet-retweet" type="button">

    <div class="child-feedback-confirmation">

      </li>

        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Embed Tweet</button>
      </li>
  </ul>
</div>

</div>

  </div>

      </div>

      

      


      
        <div class="js-tweet-text-container">
  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Tomorrow's front pages dominated by SNP MP Natalie McGarry. Still not suspended by SNP yet. Not sure why not.<a href="https://t.co/35TgrrcvtL" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/35TgrrcvtL</a></p>

      <div class="stream-item-header">
          <a class="account-group js-account-group js-action-profile js-user-profile-link js-nav" href="/RuthDavidsonMSP" data-user-id="211994193">
      <img class="avatar js-action-profile-avatar" src="https://pbs.twimg.com/profile_images/760882479548993536/Cbb5jv4-_bigger.jpg" alt="" />
    <span class="FullNameGroup">

  <p class="TweetTextSize TweetTextSize--normal js-tweet-text tweet-text" lang="en" data-aria-label-part="0">Out in Ellon with <a href="/gillianlowen" class="twitter-atreply pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr" data-mentioned-user-id="462914543"><s>@</s><b>gillianlowen</b></a> making one final push for the <a href="/hashtag/Conservatives?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Conservatives</b></a> in <a href="/hashtag/Gordon?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>Gordon</b></a> <a href="/hashtag/GE2015?src=hash" data-query-source="hashtag_click" class="twitter-hashtag pretty-link js-nav" dir="ltr"><s>#</s><b>GE2015</b></a><a href="http://t.co/mroIKubvFk" class="twitter-timeline-link u-hidden" data-pre-embedded="true" dir="ltr">pic.twitter.com/mroIKubvFk</a></p>

  </div>
  <ul>
    
      <li class="copy-link-to-tweet js-actionCopyLinkToTweet">
        <button type="button" class="dropdown-link">Copy link to Tweet</button>
      </li>
      <li class="embed-link js-actionEmbedTweet" data-nav="embed_tweet">

</div>

        <h2 class="SignupDialog-heading">Not on Twitter? Sign up, tune into the things you care about, and get updates as they happen.</h2>
        <div class="SignupDialog-form">
<div class="signup SignupForm&#10;  ">
  <a href="https://twitter.com/signup" role="button" class="EdgeButton EdgeButton--large EdgeButton--primary SignupForm-submit u-block js-signup " data-component="dialog" data-element="signup">Sign up</a>
</div>
        </div>
      </div>
      <div class="SignupDialog-footer modal-footer u-textCenter">
        Have an account? <a class="SignupDialog-signinLink" href="/login" rel="noopener">Log in </a>
      </div>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>
